Translations.Text: YA ne schitayu sebya nevinnym; strast' s siloy uvlekayet k zlu, razve tol'ko szhalit'sya nad nami Bog; no Gospod' moy terpeliv i miloserd
Togda tsar' skazal: "Privedite yego ko mne, ya sebe voz'mu yego". A posle togo, kak on govoril s nim, skazal: "S dnya sego ty budesh' bliz nas, oblechennyy vlast'yu i nashey doverennost'yu
On skazal: "Dayte mne upravleniye nad magazinami strany; ya budu vnimatel'nym blyustitelem ikh
Tak My sdelali Iosifa sil'nym v etoy strane; on mozhet selit'sya v ney, gde khochet. My nizvodim nashu milost' na kogo khotim i delayushchim dobro ne dayem ostavat'sya bez nagrady
No nagrada v budushchey zhizni budet luchshaya dlya tekh, kotoryye prebyli veruyushchimi i bogoboyazlivymi
Brat'ya Iosifa prishli i predstali pred nim: on uznal ikh, a oni yego ne ugadali

I kogda on pozvolil im zapastis' putevymi zapasami, skazal: "Privedite ko mne vashego brata, kotoryy s ottsem vashim. Ne vidite li vy, chto ya otmerivayu v vernom sootvetstvii uplate i chto ya - luchshiy iz gostepriimtsev
Yesli vy ne privedete yego ko mne, to vam ne budet khleba; i vy ne yavlyaytes' ko mne
Oni skazali: "My otprosim yego u ottsa: my eto sdelayem
Potom slugam svoim skazal: "Polozhite den'gi ikh za khleb v ikh pozhitki; mozhet byt', oni uznayut ikh, kogda vorotyatsya v domy svoi, i opyat' pridut syuda
Kogda oni vorotilis' k ottsu svoyemu, to skazali: "Batyushka! Nam otkazano v otpuske khleba: otpusti s nami brata nashego i nam otpustyat khleb. My yego budem khranit'
